text: I feel sad and really down today
Lately I've been so anxious about everything
I'm furious that my plans fell through
I'm okay
Can you give me some advice on handling stress?
What should I do when I can't sleep?
I want to hurt myself
Sometimes I think about suicide
I might end it tonight
I scratched myself yesterday but I'm trying to stop
I'm worried about tomorrow's exam
My heart races and I feel panic sometimes
I feel empty and depressed lately
I'm angry at my friend for lying
Could we talk? I need support
Can you help me with coping tips?
I want to vent about my week
I'm so tired and numb
I feel nervous and worried
Things are fine
